trans-unit.source: Provides a set of <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> methods that extend the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>方法來擴充<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>類別。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class.
trans-unit.target: 此類別中的方法被定義為擴充方法來擴充<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>類別。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: This means that they can be called like an instance method on any <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，您可以呼叫執行個體方法在任何<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>物件。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class operate on <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> objects that are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
trans-unit.target: 此類別中的方法上操作<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>相關聯的物件<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>

trans-unit.source: Waits indefinitely for the underlying <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref> to complete.
trans-unit.target: 無限期等待基礎<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>才能完成。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>方法來檢查是否<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>聯<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>之前先呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
Waits for the specified amount of time for the underlying <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref> to complete.
trans-unit.target: 等候指定的基礎的時間量<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>才能完成。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>方法來檢查是否<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>聯<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>之前先呼叫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
The amount of time to wait.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>; otherwise, `false`.
